intro: Typical Russian guy who shy to post his soul scream at VK.

post.body: The experiment result is OK. We can take a calm breath in the darknet.
Moscow is the city of broken destinies, 1581 is the new Beast Number.
Promised to protect but became gross. "Let's make the final move - along, and not across".
My Jabber inbox folder. It's colder than the winter, it's colder than the liquid nitrogenium, it's even colder than -273,5 Celsius...
"I'm the type of pony everypony, everypony should know"...
..."But I forgot who am I so I think I should go back home".
God won't punish me for hacking the historian. Because my god is  THE SAINT YUNO GASAI!
I will fight for people, not for goverment. Even if fighting for people will mean fighting with goverment.

comment.body: @cyberslave: nope, I was checking if the dangerous trend from Russian social media exists in the darknet and/or outside of ex. USSR.

Battle transcription:
[battle start]
Party:
S. Firewall - 100/100 HP, 0/0 MP
Turn 1: SKILLS>EXPEL>Yandere-tan
Yandere-tan attacks S. Firewall. Damaged by 1 HP
S. Firewall disarms Yandere-tan. Lost: KNIFE.
Turn 2: SKILLS>LOOK AROUND
Yandere-tan casts SPARE WEAPON. Got KNIFE.
S. Firewall looks around. Discovered: STRANGE DOOR.
Turn 3: SKILLS>STRANGE DOOR
Yandere-tan equips KNIFE.
S. Firewall opens the strange door. Oh, it's a time portal! Learned: REWIND.
Turn 4: SKILLS>REWIND
Yandere-tan attacks S. Firewall. Miss!
S. Firewall rewinds the time. Yandere-tan is not yandere anymore, but is going to be a yandere!
The past is not changed. Time reverts back to the present. Learned: UN-YANDERE
Turn 5: SKILLS>UN-YANDERE>Yandere-tan
Extra turn 5,5: SKILLS>CALM DOWN (*works only in lucid dreams and for female enemy) > Yandere-tan
Yandere-tan does nothing.
S. Firewall rewinds the time. Yandere-tan is not yandere anymore, but is going to be a yandere!
Ex-Yandere-tan does nothing.
S. Firewall calms down Ex-Yandere-tan. Success.
The past is changed and becomes stable.
[end of battle]
S. Firewall's party was victorious!
Earned 666 EXP.
@Sksn: I moved here this summer, but now I feel I made a mistake. And it was permanent. My good marks, my yandere girlfriend, my hometown...
